Sentencas: The structural stability and ionic conductivity of K doped LAMOX have been extensively studied by many researchers.
Titulo: Effect of K doping on Mo6+ stability and ionic conductivity study in La2Mo2O9 as oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: But the chemical state analysis and relaxation dispersion studies of La1.9K0.1Mo2O9-delta, La1.8K0.2Mo2O9-delta and pristine La2Mo2O9 are very scarcely reported.
Titulo: Effect of K doping on Mo6+ stability and ionic conductivity study in La2Mo2O9 as oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: Here in the present study, the chemical state analysis, relaxation dispersion along with structural stability and ionic conductivity studies are done to investigate the effect of K doping in LAMOX.
Titulo: Effect of K doping on Mo6+ stability and ionic conductivity study in La2Mo2O9 as oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: The room temperature XRD analysis of La1.9K0.1Mo2O9-delta, La1.8K0.2Mo2O9-delta compounds shows formation of beta-LAMOX phase along with K2O as an additional phase.
Titulo: Effect of K doping on Mo6+ stability and ionic conductivity study in La2Mo2O9 as oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: The x-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS) results are analysed for both K doped compositions sintered in air as well as in Ar 90%-H-2 10% atmosphere.
Titulo: Effect of K doping on Mo6+ stability and ionic conductivity study in La2Mo2O9 as oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: Both the compositions show good amount of Mo6+ stabilisation in Ar-H-2 atmosphere.
Titulo: Effect of K doping on Mo6+ stability and ionic conductivity study in La2Mo2O9 as oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: The Raman spectroscopy analysis of La1.9K0.1Mo2O9-delta and La2Mo2O9 shows the signature of oxygen vacancies at 866 cm(-1).
Titulo: Effect of K doping on Mo6+ stability and ionic conductivity study in La2Mo2O9 as oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: The activation energy (E-a) is found to be 0.66 eV for La1.8K0.2Mo2O9-delta.
Titulo: Effect of K doping on Mo6+ stability and ionic conductivity study in La2Mo2O9 as oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: The low value of d.c. conductivity of 12 mu S cm(-1) at 400 degrees C may be due to the hindrance imposed by large ionic radius of K+ ion as compared to La3+ ion in the structure which restricts its applications in IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Effect of K doping on Mo6+ stability and ionic conductivity study in La2Mo2O9 as oxide-ion conductor
